title: üìÉarticles-threads
desc: Wonderful resource by Gigi detailing 21 valuable lessons that come with understanding Bitcoin. The lessons can be listened to as well by the voice of...

msgs.text:
Wonderful resource by Gigi detailing 21 valuable lessons that come with understanding Bitcoin. The lessons can be listened to as well by the voice of Guy Swann. It also includes copious amounts of additional resources that branch off from each lesson:
https://21lessons.com/preface

"Gradually, Then Suddenly" - An outstanding writeup by Parker Lewis detailing about what Bitcoin is
https://nakamotoinstitute.org/mempool/series/gradually-then-suddenly/

Bitcoin myths quickly debunked
https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Myths

"The Bullish Case for Bitcoin" is a great writeup by Vijay Boyapati that summarizes why Bitcoin is the solution to the legacy fiat system 
https://vijayboyapati.medium.com/the-bullish-case-for-bitcoin-6ecc8bdecc1

"The Case for $500K Bitcoin" is a writeup where the Winklevoss twins make their case for the price eventually reaching half a million dollars 
https://winklevosscapital.com/the-case-for-500k-bitcoin/

Refreshing this site gives you a new Bitcoin quote every time 
https://www.bitcoin-quotes.com/

Speculative (but so far, accurate) price action/prediction (not financial advice) 
https://www.blockchaincenter.net/bitcoin-rainbow-chart/

Valuable and comprehensive list of lectures by amazing speaker Andreas Antonopoulos 
https://theinternetofmoney.info/the-talks/

On why Bitcoin's energy usage isn't a problem (it's a feature): 
https://www.swanbitcoin.com/bitcoins-energy-usage-is-not-a-problem-heres-why-by-lyn-alden/
If you need more convincing: https://bitcoinmagazine.com/business/bitcoin-energy-use-compare-industry

The United States went off the Gold Standard in 1971. Our fiat currency is no longer backed by anything...not to mention fractional reserve banking and qualitative easing. Did this effect anything? 
Yup...see here: https://wtfhappenedin1971.com/ 
For more see: <#875000313092902942>

Bitcoin Magazine- full of tremendous articles about Bitcoin: 
https://bitcoinmagazine.com/
Bitcoin GitHub!

The first Bitcoin website where Satoshi posted the Bitcoin White Paper. Self explanatory 
https://bitcoin.org/en/

This thread represents over 1,000 hours of research, writing and design in an attempt to better explain Bitcoin as a concept. These are the non-technical resources that are nice for newcomers to have access to as they begin their journey down the rabbit hole. 
https://twitter.com/anilsaidso/status/1292862862436626432?s=19

Bitcoin starter pack- List of resources by Lawrence (@AxCapYa): 
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ciqe6-1T6fbgPCRGBoXTrYe5AKk0RlT9s30OC0IHDHc/edit?usp=drivesdk

Austrian Economics and more via Saylor Academy: 
https://learn.saylor.org/course/view.php?id=480

"The Mother of all Orange Pills" - great resources for turning you into a Bitcoin maxi like me üòâ: 
https://armantheparman.com/moaop/

Funny (but true) sites: 
How wrong were certain people about Bitcoin: 
http://bitcoinisdead.lol
The amount of money you could have had if you purchased Bitcoin instead of (blank) 
http://bitcoinorshit.com

Models and research conducted by PlanB, a Dutch former institutional investor with 25 years of experiences in financial markets., famous for his "Stock to Flow" Bitcoin model
https://100trillionusd.github.io/

Limit your dependency on any one particular state by obtaining a second passport (if you so desire). Associated with @KatieTheRussian: 
https://www.planbpassport.com

Bitcoin has "officially died" 427 times so far dating back to 2010. See every time linked here: 
https://99bitcoins.com/bitcoin-obituaries/

This is an open letter to avid Bitcoin opponent, Senator Elizabeth Warren (it is beautifully written and I also have it posted in <#875000313092902942>): 
https://medium.com/@samanthamessing/why-progressives-should-love-bitcoin-an-open-letter-to-senator-elizabeth-warren-176ab5cc9229

With Bitcoin, Satoshi solved the famous Byzantine Generals' Problem. More here: 
https://analyticsindiamag.com/how-bitcoin-solved-the-byzantine-generals-problem/

Bitcoin glossary put together by Bitcoin Magazine. Find brief definitions of Bitcoin related words and phrases here 
https://bitcoinmagazine.com/bitcoin-glossary?mc_cid=c5f853961e&mc_eid=8cf3d05d1f

Backup your wallet seed phrases with unbreakable metal from Billfodl. I haven't done this (yet):
https://privacypros.io/products/the-billfodl/
Another option is a metal seedplate here: 
http://bitcoinseedbackup.com/
I found this video for instructions on how to set up a seedplate. Instructions: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_m5BjsdeXIY

The Best of Bitcoin Magazine - a pretty much unlimited list of wonderful articles on Bitcoin, all free. Have fun... 
https://bitcoinmagazine.com/best-of-bitcoin-magazine?mc_cid=c5f853961e&mc_eid=8cf3d05d1f

Article that compares bitcoin to real estate
https://www.citadel21.com/bitcoin-as-real-estate

Donate Bitcoin to residents of El Salvador in need. El Salvador is the first nation to adopt Bitcoin as legal tender: 
https://bitcoinsmiles.org/

This is a really great resource of documentaries, video playlists, podcasts and more:
https://www.lopp.net/bitcoin-information.html

Changes happening within the Bitcoin ecosystem and more: Bitcoin Optech helps Bitcoin users and businesses integrate scaling technologies. They provide workshops, documentation, weekly newsletters, original research, case studies and announcements, analysis of Bitcoin software and services, and help facilitate improved relations between businesses and the open source community.
https://bitcoinops.org/

How Bitcoin is Like A Giant Cybernetic Meta-Brain: The organism that is Bitcoin keeps developing new organs with new capabilities. It does so by absorbing entities that posess those abilities and composing them into itself. E.g. it can think using a brain it has made out of stringing our brains together: 
https://tomerstrolight.medium.com/how-bitcoin-is-like-a-giant-cybernetic-meta-brain-204fef9c0b08

Bitcoin is speech: Notes Toward Developing the Conceptual
Contours of Its Protection Under the First Amendment :
https://repository.law.miami.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=4591&context=umlr

Interesting article that outlines the possibility of Bitcoin leading humans to becoming a full on Type I Civilization and beyond based on the Kardashev Scale: https://studentsxstudents.com/cryptocurrency-is-transforming-society-into-the-next-star-wars-738fc6301a18

Check your financial privilege by Alex Gladstein: 
https://bitcoinmagazine.com/culture/check-your-financial-privilege

Bitcoin is doing for money what the internet did for information. Like the internet, it needs infrastructure to make good on this promise. Essentially, bitcoin is to money as what TCP/IP is to the internet...except you can own bitcoin! Governments should invest in Bitcoin:
https://www.newsweek.com/governments-should-invest-bitcoin-network-opinion-1623331

Interesting take on how lending your Bitcoin out for interest hurts the Bitcoin economy 
https://bitcoinmagazine.com/.amp/culture/earn-interest-on-bitcoin-short-sellers?__twitter_impression=true

$100,000 Bitcoin In 2021 In Play
It is not as crazy as it may sound, and here is why:
https://bitcoinmagazine.com/markets/a-100000-bitcoin-price-in-2021-is-in-play
Which country will be next? https://bitcoinmagazine.com/markets/snowden-urges-nations-to-embrace-bitcoin

https://opensats.org/ 
Open Sats is building a web donation platform where donors can learn, donate, and contribute to Bitcoin Core and related free and open source projects. 100% charitable

Own a company? Want to set up a way to collect donations in Bitcoin? Start Accepting Bitcoin Payments With 0% Fees & No Third-party with BTCPay Server:
https://btcpayserver.org/

Get paid by your company in Bitcoin with this service (2% fee):
https://www.bitwage.com/

For those who want to donate to a Bitcoin related charity - the Human Rights Foundation's Bitcoin Development Fund - In 2020, the Human Rights Foundation launched a fund to support software developers who are making the Bitcoin network more private, decentralized, and resilient so that it can better serve as a financial tool for human rights activists, civil society organizations, and journalists around the world.https://hrf.org/devfund

Another charity to donate to - Bitcoin Smiles is an initiative by BTCPay Server and Bitcoin Design contributors to raise funds to provide free checkups, dentures, and critical care for up to 50 patients in need in El Zonte, El Salvador.
https://bitcoinsmiles.org/

Meet Bitcoiners in every country, by Swan Bitcoin 
https://www.swanbitcoin.com/bitcoin-is-for-everyone/

Scam alert/scam awareness site. Don't be fooled.
https://scam-alert.io/#topscammers

Anatomy of a Bitcoin Transaction (includes a great example defining ‚Äúunspent transaction outputs‚Äù (UTXOs) which always confused me:
https://support.blockchain.com/hc/en-us/articles/360040028192-Anatomy-of-a-Bitcoin-Transaction

Presentation on Taproot and future implications:
https://kraken.docsend.com/view/9e9y7may8526z934

Loved reading this: The Frustrating, Maddening, All-Consuming Bitcoin Energy Debate
Extrapolating Bitcoin's future energy use based on its current profile leads to some very screwy numbers, says our columnist:
https://www.coindesk.com/business/2021/03/05/the-frustrating-maddening-all-consuming-bitcoin-energy-debate/

Technology and innovation are deflationary, claims Jeff Booth in his book titled, ‚Äú The Price of Tomorrow: Why Deflation is Key to an Abundant Future:
https://medium.datadriveninvestor.com/explained-jeff-booths-deflation-thesis-22d8ea0a63

A BITCOIN PRICE OF $100K COULD COME FROM A TESTOSTERONE-FUELED FRENZY:
https://bitcoinmagazine.com/culture/bitcoin-price-100k-testosterone

Masters and Slaves of Money by Robert Breedlove: 
https://breedlove22.medium.com/masters-and-slaves-of-money-255ecc93404f

This article was mentioned in spaces tonight, gonna read it tomorrow:
https://tomerstrolight.medium.com/why-everything-that-should-hurt-bitcoin-only-makes-it-stronger-c62e8bb2e961

More articles by the above author, Tomer Strolight, who is considered to be one of the best Bitcoin writers out there: 
https://tomerstrolight.medium.com/

Can't wait to read this one:
https://tomerstrolight.medium.com/why-people-wonder-if-bitcoin-is-alien-technology-f9fda5b018b
Why the world needs Bitcoin, a thread (also, this guy gives away a ton of bitcoin on twitter): https://twitter.com/realJeanRausis/status/1428061935153651712?s=20

https://nydig.com/bitcoin-net-zero/

https://www.uncerto.com/only-the-strong-survive

A Certified Bitcoin Professional is knowledgeable about the Bitcoin blockchain, Bitcoin transactions, and how the Bitcoin network operates. CBPs are able to apply Bitcoin technology to their professional area of expertise and understand privacy aspects, double-spending, and other issues that relate to the currency:
https://cryptoconsortium.org/certifications/cbp/

Bitcoin has no intrinsic value--and that's great:
https://medium.com/coinmonks/bitcoin-has-no-intrinsic-value-and-thats-great-e6994adbfe0f
Nothing has intrinsic value! Value is a phenomena of human consciousness and not one of the material world.
It is very subjective for sure

Bitcoin is the most excellent money:
https://tomerstrolight.medium.com/bitcoins-fundamental-value-is-that-it-is-the-most-excellent-money-that-exists-24be5e1d6b98

https://www.thebitcoinexam.com/

The crypto market is a scam. Bitcoin only.
https://www.forbes.com/sites/peterizzo/2021/09/29/against-cryptocurrency-the-ethical-argument-for-bitcoin-maximalism/?sh=2c60a2f0371b
It's Bitcoin or it's a shitcoin

I only say that to strangers
I only say that when someone is pissing me off with their obtuseness.

Holy moly I am so excited for this!! If anyone is familiar with Gigi's 21 lessons (one of the extremely valuable resources in <#893542458879778826>), then you will be excited for his next project here, 21 Ways. It looks like he's slowly releasing it. Two chapters can be read/listened to so far via

"The aggregate risk score measures whether or not he market is overheated. Blue is low risk, red is high risk.
Right now we are at 49% i.e. no need to be worried."

Proof of Keys Day Every January 3rd the Bitcoin community HODLers of Last Resort participate in a Proof of Keys celebration by demanding and taking possession of all bitcoins held by trusted third parties on their behalf. By demanding and taking possession of their assets, individuals will learn real fast with blockchain proof whether they are part of the elite HODLers or not. Proof of Keys is the annual HODLer initiation. This idea is also a preparation/counter/defense of a possible Executive Order 6102 type attack from the government where in 1933 FDR made holding gold illegal in the US. https://www.proofofkeys.com/

What follows is a document co-authored by several contributors to Bitcoin Magazine and proud members of the Bitcoin community. 

While many people believe that money has always exclusively been a creation of government, this is untrue. There have been many periods throughout history where governments were not the custodians of the money supply. Unfortunately, today almost every nation employs a central bank that has a monopoly on what currency is allowed to be used within their domain. 

The original signatories to this document believe that central banks and governments throughout the world have abused their exorbitant privilege of printing money. This document proposes a new way of doing things. 

We are not calling for an end to the U.S. dollar or any other fiat currency ‚Äî we are asking to bring an end to monopoly money in every country. Give citizens a choice. 

Let market forces and participants decide if they want this new form of ‚Äúmagic internet money‚Äù that is based on rules, not rulers. Bitcoin benefits the entire planet. Those who sign believe bitcoin is a peaceful revolution that favors the billions, not billionaires. We urge you to read it and sign it if you are so inspired. https://declarationofmonetaryindependence.org/

Examining The Lindy Effect And Bitcoin:
The Lindy effect is an important phenomenon to understand. Simply put, the longer something has survived, the longer it is likely to exist into the future. Bitcoin has survived for almost 13 years. During that time, it has developed strong network effects which will help it continue to survive, and thrive, long into the future.
https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/examining-the-lindy-effect-and-bitcoin
